name: Gift of Life
description:
Welcome to the magic world of Gift of Life

Somewhere in this world lives a bad magic creature, that is destroying whole world.
He awaits you in his castle and he is watching you, because you are the one, who can stop him.

You have to defeat him with one of three playable characters.

Gift of Life is challenging platformer which can offer 7 nice levels. You can play as one of three characters, green, blue and pink.

This game has two difficulty modes, medium and hard. In medium, you have checkpoints and after death you respawn at last activated checkpoint, but in hard mode you respawn at the beginning of whole level.

Also this game can be played in more speed modes exactly as you like.

As you travel, you encounter enemies, so you can jump on the most like in Super Mario, but there are enemies, which cannot be killed and one boss at the end of game.

You can only run this game on Windows, Linux and Android yet, but it's comming soon also on Mac and iOS.
